devdoc.author: 0nika0

calculateAmount(bytes).details: This public view function calculates the amount of a token based on a set of input parameters.  It decodes the parameters, retrieves the necessary information from a Hegic strategy,  calculates the premium amount from positive PNL (Profit and Loss),  and ensures it does not exceed the maximum total cost.

params.parameters: The encoded parameters for the calculation.

returns.amount: The calculated amount of the token.
returns.token: The address of the token to be calculated.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Transaction Builder for Opening Hegic Option Positions

OpenPositionByHegic(uint256,uint256,addr.notice: Emitted when a Hegic option position is opened.

calculateAmount(bytes).notice: Calculate the amount of a token based on provided parameters.

userdoc.notice: This contract facilitates the opening of Hegic option positions using predefined parameters.
